GSD.product_version: versions from v5.10 to before v6.1.7
GSD.description:
drm/i915: Fix potential context UAFs

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.7 by commit b696c627b3f56e173f7f70b8487d66da8ff22506, it was introduced in version v5.10 by commit eb4dedae920a07c485328af3da2202ec5184fb17. For more details please see the references link.
